Title: The Lockout
Writer: Abbi Jacobson (created by), Ilana Glazer (created by), Abbi Jacobson, Ilana Glazer
Actors: Abbi Jacobson, Ilana Glazer, John Gemberling, Arturo Castro
Plot: After Abbi bug bombs her apartment, and Ilana misplaces her keys, the girls are forced to face life on the streets - just in time for Abbi's first art gallery show.
